metadata.name: How Ya Doing
metadata.description:
"How Ya Doing Baby?"

Inspired by the fourth track off of Balt Getty's Sad Boy LP, 'How Ya Doing' is the story of a passionate love that ended but never lost its luster. Time has passed, but when the lovers reunite the feeling continues as though nothing has changed.

A glance into each others eyes, a touch, and one simple question - 'How Ya Doing?' Getty's icy cool way of capturing this emotion through minimalist production and simple yet poignant lyrics is a hallmark of the Sad Boy project as a whole. Capture this moment for yourself in this one of one audio-visual NFT.

The first buyer of this collectible will receive -

1. [Sad Boy Hoodie](https://www.purplehausrecords.com/product-page/sad-boy-hoodie "Sad Boy Hoodie"), signed by Balthazar Getty
2. A lossless WAV file of the song
3. A high-res video
